snippet: The use of advanced diagnostic imaging like CT and PET scans has soared in recent years, even when doctors do not stand to profit, a study of H.M.O. data has found.
abstract: Journal of the American Medical Assn study says the use of diagnostic imaging like CT and PET scans has soared in health maintenance organizations in recent years, as has patients' radiation exposure.
lead_paragraph: The use of advanced diagnostic imaging like CT and PET scans has soared in recent years, even when doctors do not stand to profit, a study of H.M.O. data has found.

headline.seo: As Medical Imaging Rises, Radiation Concerns Follow
headline.main: Radiation Concerns Rise With Patients’ Exposure
headline.print_headline: Radiation Concerns Rise With Patients’ Exposure

keywords.value: Journal of the American Medical Assn
keywords.name: organizations
